category.name: Active Workspace
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: AWB_default_secondary_page
preference.preference_description: Defines the default page shown in the secondary Work Area. The preference value will be of type:page format, which define a default page for a particular type. If the type value is BusinessObject, then the page will be for any type which does not have a specific preference value. If a type is not defined, the system will look for the first defined super type in the preference. The page can be the title key of the page or the enablement feature key for a contributed page.
